entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:11 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 08:13 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
